original_text: They waited to the point of embarrassment, but when he did not open the doors of the room, they took a key and unlocked them. There they saw their lord fallen to the floor, dead.
korean_text: 그들이 오래 기다려도 왕이 다락문들을 열지 아니하는지라 열쇠를 가지고 열어 본즉 그들의 군주가 이미 땅에 엎드러져 죽었더라

sentences.original_text: They waited to the point of embarrassment
but when he did not open the doors of the room
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그가 방의 문을 열지 않았을 때

sentences.original_text: they took a key and unlocked them
